text: Sergei Kovalev (born 1930) is a Russian human rights activist Sergei Kovalev or Sergei Kovalyov may also refer to: * Sergey Kovalev (boxer) (born 1983), Russian boxer * Sergey Kovalev (historian) (1886–1960), Soviet historian * Sergei Kovalyov (footballer, born 1965), Russian footballer * Sergei Kovalyov (footballer, born 1972), Russian footballer * Sergey Kovalev (gymnast) (born 1988), Russian trampolinist * Sergei Nikitich Kovalev (1919–2011), Russian submarine designer
title: Sergei Kovalev (disambiguation)
